messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I need to escape these doldrums...
You can keep me company.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
That did liberate me from the doldrums,
but at what price...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I’m going back to the hotel to rest!
I find you exceedingly tiresome!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I’m afraid I’m in the doldrums again.
You shall keep me company again!
